Description: Switch to retrieve the tutorial data set instead of the full data set.
Restrict console outputs to all infos, warning or errors only
Custom format for log messages. See `LogRecord <https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html#logging.LogRecord>`_ attributes.
Optionally specify the ENTSO-E API key. See the guidelines to get `ENTSO-E API key <https://transparency.entsoe.eu/content/static_content/Static%20content/web%20api/Guide.html>`_
Optionally specify the SSH of a remote cluster to be synchronized.
Optionally specify the file path within the remote cluster to be synchronized.
Optionally specify the focus weights for the clustering of countries. For instance: `DE: 0.8` will distribute 80% of all nodes to Germany and 20% to the rest of the countries.
